title: wine_Lemelson_2006_Meyer_Vineyard_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 12863.
country: US.
description: The Meyer Vineyard, in the Red Hills of Dundee, ripened especially well in 2006, bringing forth concentrated fruits that mix raspberry, cranberry, pie cherry and finishing hints of rhubarb. Spice and sharp acids add definition to the midpalate, and the careful barrel aging has introduced accent notes of nutmeg, licorice and black tea. Despite its heft and substantial 14.6% alcohol, this wine has a sleekness that carries it gracefully into a lengthy, elegant finish..
designation: Meyer Vineyard.
points: 91.
price: 48.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
